vclaim: Domino’s Pizza is bringing back the Noid, a villainous mascot that coincidentally shares a name with a real man who once took hostages at a Domino’s shop in 1989.
title: Is Domino’s Bringing Back Noid, a Mascot That Reportedly Drove a Man to Take Hostages?
subtitle: The character has a complicated backstory.
author: Nur Ibrahim
